title: Info Sec Lab Binexp
description:
This course covers advanced techniques for writing exploits, taught
through an intense, hands-on security laboratory, following a
cyberspace war game called Capture-The-Flag.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 6238 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CS 6262 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
